fields.name: Serengeti National Park
fields.description: World-famous savanna park protecting the Serengeti-Mara ecosystem — home to the Great Wildebeest Migration, large predator populations, vast plains and rich birdlife.
fields.short_description: Iconic savanna park known for the Great Migration and abundant wildlife.
fields.main_attractions: Great Wildebeest Migration, Seronera, kopjes, predators, birding
fields.wildlife_species: Wildebeest, Zebra, Lion, Cheetah, Elephant, Giraffe, Buffalo, Hyena
fields.vegetation_types: Grassland savanna, acacia woodland, riverine gallery forest
fields.accessibility_info: Multiple airstrips and road access; part of the northern safari circuit
fields.meta_description: Serengeti National Park (14,763 km²) — home of the Great Wildebeest Migration and rich predator populations.

fields.name: Ngorongoro Conservation Area
fields.description: UNESCO-listed conservation area with the Ngorongoro Crater — high wildlife densities and significant paleoanthropological sites.
fields.short_description: UNESCO World Heritage area containing the Ngorongoro Crater.
fields.main_attractions: Ngorongoro Crater, Olduvai Gorge, Maasai cultural experiences
fields.wildlife_species: Black rhino (historic), Lion, Elephant, Buffalo, Wildebeest, Zebra, Hippo
fields.vegetation_types: Montane forest, crater floor grasslands, savanna
fields.accessibility_info: Driveable from Arusha; strict crater entry rules and visitor regulations.
fields.meta_description: Ngorongoro Conservation Area — home to the famous crater and rich archaeological sites.

fields.name: Tarangire National Park
fields.description: Riverine habitats and baobab-dotted plains famous for large seasonal concentrations of elephants and excellent birding.
fields.short_description: Baobab-studded plains and large elephant herds.
fields.main_attractions: Tarangire River, baobab trees, elephants, birdwatching
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Buffalo, Zebra, Wildebeest, Giraffe, Lion, Leopard
fields.accessibility_info: Driveable from Arusha; popular on northern circuit day-trips.
fields.meta_description: Tarangire — known for seasonal elephant concentrations and baobab trees.

fields.name: Lake Manyara National Park
fields.description: A shallow, soda-ash lake surrounded by groundwater forest and acacia steppe — famed for tree-climbing lions and abundant birdlife.
fields.short_description: Lake and forest habitat with tree-climbing lions and exceptional birding.
fields.main_attractions: Tree-climbing lions, flamingos, groundwater forest, birding
fields.wildlife_species: Lion (tree-climbing), Elephant, Buffalo, Hippo, Flamingo
fields.vegetation_types: Groundwater forest, acacia woodland, lake margins
fields.accessibility_info: Short drive from Arusha; common on northern circuit itineraries.
fields.meta_description: Lake Manyara — renowned for its birdlife and tree-climbing lions.

fields.name: Arusha National Park
fields.description: Small but biologically diverse park including Mount Meru, crater lakes and woodland — great for walking safaris and day trips.
fields.short_description: Compact park with Mount Meru, crater lakes and walking safaris.
fields.main_attractions: Mount Meru hikes, Momella lakes, Ngurdoto Crater
fields.wildlife_species: Buffalo, Black-and-white colobus, Giraffe, Zebra, Hippo
fields.accessibility_info: Short drive from Arusha town; easy access suitable for day visits and hikes
fields.meta_description: Arusha NP — compact park with Mount Meru, crater lakes and walking safari options.

fields.name: Kilimanjaro National Park
fields.description: Home to Africa's highest peak, Mount Kilimanjaro — popular for multi-day climbs through varied ecological zones from rainforest to alpine desert.
fields.short_description: Home of Mount Kilimanjaro, Africa's highest mountain and famous trekking destination.
fields.main_attractions: Kilimanjaro summit climbs, montane forest, Lemosho/Machame routes
fields.wildlife_species: Blue monkeys, Colobus, small mammals and birds adapted to montane habitats
fields.vegetation_types: Montane forest, heath, moorland, alpine desert
fields.recommended_duration: 6-8 days (common routes), up to 10 days for safer ascent
fields.accessibility_info: Trailheads accessed via Moshi; permits required for climbing
fields.meta_description: Kilimanjaro National Park — Mount Kilimanjaro trekking and unique montane ecology.

fields.name: Mikumi National Park
fields.description: Savanna park close to the Udzungwa foothills, often visited on day trips from Dar es Salaam; known for accessible game drives and diverse birdlife.
fields.short_description: Accessible savanna park east of the Udzungwa mountains, good for short safaris.
fields.main_attractions: Malundwe mountain, Mkata floodplain, hippo pools
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Buffalo, Zebra, Giraffe, Wildebeest, Hippo
fields.vegetation_types: Savanna grassland, acacia and baobab trees
fields.geological_features: Alluvial plains and nearby mountain ridges
fields.accessibility_info: Along A7 highway (~3–4 hours from Dar es Salaam)
fields.meta_description: Mikumi National Park (3,230 km²) — accessible park near Morogoro with elephant and savanna wildlife.

fields.name: Ruaha National Park
fields.description: Large, relatively remote wilderness park with diverse habitats and important predator and elephant populations.
fields.short_description: Vast remote park famed for predators and large elephant herds.
fields.main_attractions: Great Ruaha River, remote wilderness, big cat sightings
fields.wildlife_species: Lion, Leopard, Elephant, Cheetah, Wild dog, Buffalo
fields.accessibility_info: Long drives or charters; remote lodges and airstrips
fields.meta_description: Ruaha — expansive wilderness and strong predator populations.

fields.name: Katavi National Park
fields.description: Remote western park with dramatic seasonal wildlife concentrations — famous for large herds and wild, uncrowded wilderness.
fields.short_description: Remote wilderness with spectacular seasonal wildlife concentrations.
fields.main_attractions: Seasonal herds, hippo pools, predator action
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Buffalo, Hippo, Lion, Leopard, Zebra
fields.accessibility_info: Remote access by charter or long road transfers
fields.meta_description: Katavi — remote park with dramatic seasonal wildlife concentrations.

fields.name: Nyerere National Park (Selous)
fields.description: Former Selous Game Reserve, redesignated as Nyerere National Park — one of the largest protected wilderness areas with river systems and diverse habitats.
fields.short_description: Large southern park (formerly Selous) with riverine habitats and large wildlife populations.
fields.main_attractions: Great Rufiji River, boat safaris, remote wilderness
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Hippo, Crocodile, Lion, Wild dog
fields.vegetation_types: Riverine forests, miombo woodland, open savanna
fields.accessibility_info: Charter flights or long drives; boat safaris available
fields.meta_description: Nyerere (Selous) — expansive southern wilderness and river systems.

fields.name: Kitulo National Park
fields.description: High-elevation 'flower' plateau famous for spring wildflower displays; important for endemic orchids and montane grassland biodiversity.
fields.short_description: Flowering plateau with unique montane flora and orchids.
fields.main_attractions: Wildflower displays, endemic plants, montane vistas
fields.wildlife_species: Small mammals, montane birdlife and endemic plants
fields.geological_features: High plateau and rolling upland terrain
fields.accessibility_info: Road access via Mbeya; higher-elevation terrain
fields.meta_description: Kitulo NP — montane plateau famous for wildflowers and orchids.

fields.name: Rubondo Island National Park
fields.description: Island park in Lake Victoria known for forested habitats, chimpanzee translocations and island wildlife.
fields.short_description: Forest island park on Lake Victoria with translocated chimpanzees and forest habitat.
fields.main_attractions: Chimpanzee viewing, forest walks, fishing and birding
fields.wildlife_species: Chimpanzee, Sitatunga (occasionally), birds, small mammals
fields.accessibility_info: Boat access from nearby Lake Victoria ports
fields.meta_description: Rubondo Island — forested island park on Lake Victoria with chimpanzees.

fields.name: Gombe Stream National Park
fields.description: Small forested park famous for Jane Goodall's long-term chimpanzee studies and chimpanzee tracking tourism.
fields.short_description: Small forest park world-famous for chimpanzee research and tracking.
fields.main_attractions: Chimpanzee trekking, forest hikes, lakeshore views
fields.wildlife_species: Chimpanzee, other primates, forest birds
fields.geological_features: Steep forested slopes along Lake Tanganyika
fields.accessibility_info: Boat access from Kigoma; short hikes to chimp sites
fields.meta_description: Gombe Stream — famous for Jane Goodall's chimpanzee research and trekking.

fields.name: Mahale Mountains National Park
fields.description: Remote lakeshore and mountain park known for wild chimpanzee populations, forest habitat and spectacular lakeside scenery.
fields.short_description: Mountain and lakeshore park famous for chimpanzees and remote wilderness.
fields.main_attractions: Chimpanzee trekking, Mahale peaks, Lake Tanganyika scenery
fields.wildlife_species: Chimpanzee, primates, forest birds
fields.geological_features: Steep mountain slopes meeting the lake
fields.accessibility_info: Access by boat from Kigoma; remote lodges
fields.meta_description: Mahale — remote mountains and chimpanzee tracking on Lake Tanganyika.

fields.name: Mkomazi National Park
fields.description: Dryland park bordering Kenya; important for black rhino reintroduction and black rhino & oryx conservation programs.
fields.short_description: Conservation park with important rhino and antelope programs.
fields.main_attractions: Rhino reintroductions, dryland wildlife, conservation projects
fields.wildlife_species: Black rhino (conservation), Elephant, Oryx, Gerenuk
fields.accessibility_info: Accessible by road from Tanga/Moshi regions
fields.meta_description: Mkomazi — conservation-focused park with rhino and antelope projects.

fields.name: Burigi-Chato National Park
fields.description: Newer national park in the north-west with lakes, woodlands and cultural sites, formed by combining Burigi and Chato areas.
fields.short_description: New northwestern park with lakes, woodlands and diverse habitats.
fields.main_attractions: Lakes, birdlife, local culture
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Hippo, Buffalo, birds
fields.accessibility_info: Accessible by road from Bukoba; developing infrastructure
fields.meta_description: Burigi-Chato — northwestern park with lakes and woodland habitats.

fields.name: Kigosi National Park
fields.description: Wetland-dominated western park protecting floodplains and freshwater ecosystems important for waterbirds and wetland wildlife.
fields.short_description: Western wetland park protecting floodplains and waterbird habitats.
fields.main_attractions: Wetlands, birdlife, seasonal floods
fields.wildlife_species: Waterbirds, hippos, crocodiles, seasonal mammals
fields.accessibility_info: Remote; seasonal access conditions apply
fields.meta_description: Kigosi — western wetlands and floodplain habitats for waterbirds and wildlife.

fields.name: Ibanda-Kyerwa National Park
fields.description: Recently declared national park in Kagera region protecting miombo woodlands, riverine habitats and wildlife populations.
fields.short_description: New northwest park protecting woodland and riverine habitats.
fields.main_attractions: Woodlands, rivers, birdlife
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, Buffalo, antelope, birds
fields.accessibility_info: Developing infrastructure; access by road from Bukoba
fields.meta_description: Ibanda-Kyerwa — new park protecting miombo woodlands and riverine habitats.

fields.name: Rumanyika-Karagwe National Park
fields.description: Small park protecting dry montane and woodland habitats with community tourism potential and historical cultural sites.
fields.short_description: Small Kagera park with woodland and cultural attractions.
fields.main_attractions: Woodland wildlife, viewpoints, community tourism
fields.wildlife_species: Antelope species, small mammals, birds
fields.accessibility_info: Access by road from regional towns; limited infrastructure
fields.meta_description: Rumanyika-Karagwe — small park in Kagera with woodland and cultural sites.

fields.name: Saanane Island National Park
fields.description: Small island park on Lake Victoria close to Mwanza, protecting dry forest and serving as an accessible wildlife and birding site near the city.
fields.short_description: Tiny island park on Lake Victoria, ideal for short visits and birding.
fields.main_attractions: Birdwatching, short walking trails, lakeshore views
fields.wildlife_species: Primates, small mammals, waterbirds
fields.accessibility_info: Boat access from Mwanza; short day visits from the city
fields.meta_description: Saanane Island — small island park on Lake Victoria close to Mwanza.

fields.name: Udzungwa Mountains National Park
fields.description: Montane forest park forming part of the Eastern Arc Mountains — important for endemic species, waterfalls and rainforest hiking.
fields.short_description: Montane rainforest with endemic wildlife and scenic waterfalls.
fields.main_attractions: Hiking, Sanje Waterfalls, endemic primates and plants
fields.wildlife_species: Sanje mangabey, Udzungwa red colobus, endemic birds
fields.vegetation_types: Montane and lowland rainforest, riverine forest
fields.accessibility_info: Access via road from Iringa/Morogoro; hiking trails available
fields.meta_description: Udzungwa Mountains NP — rainforest, hikes and endemic species in the Eastern Arc.

fields.name: Saadani National Park
fields.description: Coastal national park where bush meets beach — notable for beaches, mangroves and opportunities for boat safaris and coastal wildlife viewing.
fields.short_description: Coastal park mixing beach, mangrove and savanna habitats.
fields.main_attractions: Beaches, mangroves, coastal boat safaris, wildlife viewing
fields.wildlife_species: Elephant, buffalo, antelope, marine birds, hippo (in rivers)
fields.vegetation_types: Mangrove, coastal bush, riverine forest, savanna
fields.accessibility_info: Road access from Bagamoyo/other coastal towns; boat transfers available
fields.meta_description: Saadani NP — unique coastal park where the bush meets the Indian Ocean.

fields.name: Mafia Island Marine Park
fields.description: Marine protected area centered on Mafia Island — important for coral reefs, whale sharks, diving and marine biodiversity.
fields.short_description: Marine park protecting coral reefs and coastal marine life around Mafia Island.
fields.main_attractions: Diving, snorkeling, whale shark sightings (seasonal), coral reefs
fields.wildlife_species: Coral, reef fishes, sea turtles, whale sharks (seasonal)
fields.accessibility_info: Boat or small plane transfers via Mafia Island; dive operators available
fields.meta_description: Mafia Island Marine Park — coral reefs, diving and marine wildlife.

fields.description: A large social big-cat found in savanna and open woodland; apex predator in Tanzania's national parks.
fields.physical_characteristics: Muscular, tawny coat; males often have manes; 150–250 kg.
fields.habitat: Savanna, open woodlands, grasslands and kopje areas.
fields.diet: Carnivorous — medium to large ungulates (wildebeest, zebra, buffalo).
fields.behavior: Social, hunts in groups (prides); active mostly at dawn/dusk.
fields.best_viewing_times: Early morning and late afternoon; dry season (June–October).
fields.best_viewing_locations: Seronera (Serengeti), Ngorongoro Crater floor, Ruaha river valleys.

fields.description: The largest land mammal, with tusks and a trunk; important ecosystem engineers in savanna and miombo woodland.
fields.physical_characteristics: Very large body, long trunk, tusks; adult males up to 6 tonnes.
fields.diet: Herbivorous — grasses, leaves, bark and fruit.
fields.behavior: Social matriarchal herds; migratory in seasonal areas.
fields.best_viewing_times: Dry season when concentrated around permanent water (June–October).

fields.description: Large, sturdy bovine often seen in herds near water; one of Africa's 'Big Five'.
fields.physical_characteristics: Robust body, curved horns forming a shield on males.
fields.behavior: Gregarious herds with strong social bonds; can be defensive against predators.
fields.best_viewing_times: Dry season near water sources; dusk and dawn.

fields.description: Stealthy solitary big cat, excellent climber; commonly uses rocky kopjes and woodlands for ambush hunting.
fields.physical_characteristics: Spotted coat, muscular build, 30–90 kg depending on sex and region.
fields.habitat: Woodland, riverine forest, kopje and savanna edge habitats.
fields.diet: Carnivorous — medium-sized mammals, primates and birds.
fields.behavior: Nocturnal/crepuscular, solitary; stores kills in trees.
fields.best_viewing_times: Dusk to dawn; dry season near watering points and rocky outcrops.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Serengeti kopjes, Ngorongoro rim, Ruaha rocky areas.

fields.description: Fastest land mammal, adapted to open plains for high-speed chases of gazelles and other small ungulates.
fields.physical_characteristics: Slim build, spotted coat, distinctive tear streaks, speeds up to 100 km/h.
fields.diet: Carnivorous — gazelles, young ungulates and hares.
fields.behavior: Diurnal hunters; females solitary or with cubs, males may form coalitions.
fields.best_viewing_times: Early morning and late afternoon during dry season.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Serengeti open plains (during migration windows), Tarangire grasslands.

fields.description: Gregarious antelope known for the Great Migration — massive herds moving seasonally in search of pasture.
fields.physical_characteristics: Stocky build, dark mane, shoulder hump and curved horns.
fields.behavior: Highly migratory with seasonal large-scale movements and synchronized calving.
fields.best_viewing_times: Migration peaks: roughly June–July (northern crossing) and Dec–Mar (southern phases vary).

fields.description: Striped equid common across Tanzania's savannas; often grazes and migrates with wildebeest.
fields.physical_characteristics: Distinctive black-and-white striping; stocky equine body.
fields.behavior: Social herds with seasonal movements linked to rainfall and grazing availability.
fields.best_viewing_times: Dry season grazing areas; daytime activity.

fields.description: Tall browsing ungulate with patterned coat; common in savanna areas and woodlands.
fields.physical_characteristics: Very tall neck and long legs; patchy coat pattern (species-specific).
fields.habitat: Open woodland and savanna where browse is available.
fields.diet: Browses leaves, shoots and twigs (especially acacia).
fields.behavior: Roaming browsers often seen feeding at treetop level; males spar using necking.
fields.best_viewing_times: Daytime; dry season near riverine trees.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Tarangire baobab areas, Serengeti woodlands, Mikumi.

fields.description: Highly social carnivore with mottled coat and large rounded ears; hunts cooperatively in packs.
fields.physical_characteristics: Lean body, patchy coat pattern, large ears; 20–30 kg.
fields.habitat: Open woodland, savanna and mosaic habitats.
fields.behavior: Pack hunters with high success rates; large home ranges and nomadic habits.
fields.best_viewing_times: Early morning and late afternoon; dry season when prey concentrates.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Ruaha, Katavi and parts of Nyerere (Selous) where packs exist.

fields.description: Critically endangered browser with two horns; conservation and reintroduction projects operate in several Tanzanian areas.
fields.physical_characteristics: Stocky body, hooked lip for browsing, two horns on snout.
fields.habitat: Dry shrubland and savanna with browse availability.
fields.behavior: Mostly solitary; vulnerable to poaching and disturbance.
fields.best_viewing_times: Daytime in protected reintroduction areas; sightings rare and often localized.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Mkomazi (conservation reintroductions), protected zones in northern parks.

fields.description: Large semiaquatic mammal frequenting rivers and pools; active mostly at night feeding on grasses.
fields.physical_characteristics: Massive barrel-shaped body, large mouth and tusks; amphibious lifestyle.
fields.diet: Primarily grazes on grasses at night.
fields.behavior: Daytime resting in water; territorial males around pools and channels.
fields.best_viewing_times: Early morning/late afternoon at riverbanks and hippo pools.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Katavi hippo pools, Great Ruaha River (Ruaha), Rufiji (Nyerere).

fields.description: Large freshwater predator inhabiting rivers, lakes and wetlands; ambush predator on banks.
fields.physical_characteristics: Heavily armored body, powerful jaws and tail; can exceed several meters in length.
fields.habitat: Rivers, lakes, floodplain wetlands and pans.
fields.diet: Piscivorous and generalist predator — fish, mammals, birds.
fields.behavior: Sit-and-wait predator; basks on banks and active at night.
fields.best_viewing_times: Daytime basking spots; boat/river safaris are best for safe viewing.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Rufiji River (Nyerere), Great Ruaha (Ruaha), Katavi waterways.

fields.description: Large pink wading bird found on alkaline lakes and shallow wetlands, forming large flocks and spectacular roosts.
fields.physical_characteristics: Long legs and neck, pink plumage due to diet, filter-feeding bill.
fields.habitat: Alkaline lakes, shallow lagoons and lake margins.
fields.diet: Filter-feeds on brine shrimp, algae and small invertebrates.
fields.behavior: Colonial nesting and flocking; often seen in large numbers on Lake Manyara and soda lakes.
fields.best_viewing_times: Dry season when water levels concentrate birds; daylight hours.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Lake Manyara shores and shallow pans in the Serengeti region.

fields.description: Arboreal monkey with striking black-and-white fur and long tail; common in montane and riverine forests.
fields.physical_characteristics: Black body with white mantle and long white tail tuft; specialized stomach for leaf digestion.
fields.habitat: Montane and riverine forest, gallery forests and wooded slopes.
fields.behavior: Arboreal, lives in social groups; diurnal and highly vocal.
fields.best_viewing_times: Daytime in forested areas; best seen on walks and forest trails.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Arusha forested zones, Rubondo and Udzungwa forest patches.

fields.description: Endemic primate restricted to the Udzungwa Mountains — locally important and a major draw for primate enthusiasts.
fields.physical_characteristics: Medium-sized monkey with dark fur and pale facial markings.
fields.habitat: Montane and lowland rainforest in the Udzungwa range.
fields.behavior: Arboreal and social; often seen in small groups during forest walks.
fields.best_viewing_times: Morning forest walks in Udzungwa; guided primate tracking.
fields.best_viewing_locations: Sanje forest trails (Udzungwa Mountains National Park).

fields.description: Endemic red colobus monkey of the Udzungwa Mountains, important for biodiversity values of the Eastern Arc.
fields.physical_characteristics: Reddish-brown fur, slender body and long tail; adapted to canopy life.
fields.habitat: Montane and submontane rainforest of the Udzungwa range.
fields.diet: Primarily folivorous, supplemented with fruit and seeds.
fields.behavior: Highly arboreal, lives in social groups; often located by vocalizations.
fields.best_viewing_times: Guided forest treks in the morning; dry season trails are easier to access.

fields.name: Seronera Visitor Centre
fields.description: Main visitor centre in Seronera offering exhibits, park information and permit services.
fields.features: Exhibits, information desk, toilets, small shop

fields.name: Seronera Lodge
fields.description: Full-service lodge located near Seronera with accommodation and guided drive pick-up.

fields.name: Ngorongoro Crater Rim Viewpoint
fields.description: Popular viewpoint offering panoramic views across the crater floor.

fields.name: Tarangire Public Campsite
fields.description: Park-managed campsite with designated pitches, shared ablutions and ranger station nearby.
fields.features: Toilets, showers, fire rings, ranger contact

fields.name: Manyara Lakeside Restaurant
fields.description: Restaurant near the park entrance serving local and international dishes.
fields.features: Indoor seating, terrace with lake views, vegetarian options

fields.name: Ngurdoto Crater Viewpoint
fields.description: Scenic viewpoint over Ngurdoto Crater with short walking trails.

fields.name: Kilimanjaro National Park HQ (Moshi)
fields.description: Park headquarters for permit processing and information for Kilimanjaro treks.

fields.name: Mikumi Lodge
fields.description: Lodge close to Mikumi park entrance with rooms and safari guides.

fields.name: Ruaha Research Camp
fields.description: Field research station used by conservation teams and researchers.

fields.name: Katavi Hippo Pools Viewpoint
fields.description: Observation area overlooking hippo pools and floodplain channels.

fields.name: Rufiji River Lodge
fields.description: Riverside lodge offering boat safaris and guided excursions in Nyerere (Selous).

fields.name: Kitulo Plateau Lookout
fields.description: Scenic viewpoints across the flower-rich plateau; seasonal wildflower information boards.

fields.name: Rubondo Research & Visitor Centre
fields.description: Small centre supporting chimpanzee monitoring and visitor orientation.

fields.name: Gombe Campsite
fields.description: Campsite used by visitors coming for chimp trekking and lake access.
fields.features: Basic ablutions, secure store, ranger contact

fields.name: Mahale Lakeside Camp
fields.description: Lakeside accommodation for chimp tracking visitors with boat access.
fields.features: Boat transfer, guided chimp walks, meals included

fields.name: Mkomazi Conservation Centre
fields.description: Conservation and rhino-reintroduction centre supporting anti-poaching and monitoring.
fields.features: Monitoring HQ, ranger accommodation, veterinary facilities

fields.name: Saanane Birdwatching Point
fields.description: Small viewpoint and platform ideal for birdwatching on Saanane Island.

fields.name: Saadani Park Entrance Parking
fields.description: Visitor parking at Saadani park entrance with ticket booth and restrooms nearby.

fields.name: Seronera Wildlife Area
fields.description: Core Serengeti area around Seronera with high predator and ungulate sightings and riverine patches.
fields.short_description: Primary wildlife viewing area in the central Serengeti around Seronera.
fields.activities: Game drives, photography, guided drives
fields.accessibility: Accessible by road and small aircraft to Seronera airstrip; vehicles recommended.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Mostly vehicle-based; short guided walks in designated spots.

fields.caption: Seronera river and grazing wildebeest
fields.alt_text: Wildebeest grazing near Seronera river in Serengeti

fields.caption: Granitic kopje silhouette at sunset
fields.alt_text: Rocky kopje with acacia and savanna sky

fields.name: Ngorongoro Crater Floor
fields.description: The crater floor with dense concentrations of wildlife and permanent waterholes.
fields.short_description: Wildlife-rich crater floor in Ngorongoro Conservation Area.
fields.activities: Game drives, birdwatching, cultural visits nearby
fields.accessibility: Steep access road to crater floor; permits required at entry gate.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Vehicle-based viewing; short walks allowed in specific areas.

fields.caption: Ngorongoro Crater panorama
fields.alt_text: Aerial view across Ngorongoro Crater showing crater floor and rim

fields.caption: Lerai Forest and resident buffalo
fields.alt_text: Buffalo under tall fig trees at Lerai Forest

fields.name: Tarangire Elephant Plains
fields.description: Floodplain and riverine areas where elephants gather seasonally alongside baobab-dotted plains.
fields.short_description: Tarangire areas famous for large elephant concentrations and baobabs.
fields.activities: Game drives, birdwatching, photography
fields.accessibility: Good road access; popular on northern circuit.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Primarily vehicle-based viewing with short nature walks permitted.

fields.caption: Baobab and elephants at dusk
fields.alt_text: Elephants moving past a baobab tree at sunset in Tarangire

fields.caption: Tarangire River floodplain
fields.alt_text: Green riverine corridor and grazing animals

fields.name: Lake Manyara Tree-Lion Trail
fields.description: Areas along the lake edge and groundwater forest where tree-climbing lions are often observed and birds congregate.
fields.short_description: Lake Manyara viewpoints notable for tree-climbing lions and birdlife.
fields.activities: Game drives, birdwatching, short walks
fields.accessibility: Short drive from regional hubs; popular half-day excursion.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short, <1km walks in forest paths.

fields.caption: Flamingo-lined lake edge
fields.alt_text: Shallow lake shore with flamingos and wetland birds

fields.caption: Lion resting in a tree
fields.alt_text: Lion perched on a tree branch in Lake Manyara

fields.name: Mount Meru Hike (Arusha NP)
fields.description: Trail system around Mount Meru offering multi-day hikes, crater rim views and montane habitats.
fields.short_description: Mount Meru trails and crater viewpoints in Arusha National Park.
fields.activities: Hiking, wildlife viewing, crater rim photography
fields.accessibility: Trailheads accessible via Arusha; guided hikes required for summit attempts.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Multi-day hikes from trailhead; distances vary.

fields.caption: Mount Meru from the valley
fields.alt_text: Snowless Mount Meru peak and forested slopes

fields.caption: Momella lakes and flamingos
fields.alt_text: Pink flamingos and shallow lakes in Arusha NP

fields.name: Kilimanjaro Summit Routes
fields.description: Classic routes (Machame, Lemosho, Marangu) ascending through rainforest, heath, moorland to the glaciated summit.
fields.short_description: Trekking routes to Uhuru Peak on Mount Kilimanjaro.
fields.activities: Multi-day trekking, guided climbs
fields.accessibility: Trailheads reached from Moshi; permits required and guides mandatory.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Long multi-day treks from trailheads.

fields.caption: Shira Plateau on Kilimanjaro
fields.alt_text: Wide moorland plateau with distant Kilimanjaro summit

fields.caption: Uhuru Peak sunrise
fields.alt_text: Sunrise over Uhuru Peak and glaciated summit

fields.name: Mikumi Mkata Floodplain
fields.description: Floodplain region and hippo pools with diverse savanna wildlife and proximity to Malundwe mountain.
fields.short_description: Accessible floodplain wildlife viewing in Mikumi NP.
fields.activities: Game drives, birdwatching, short hikes
fields.accessibility: Driveable from Dar es Salaam; popular short safari option.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Vehicle-based; short guided walks in safe zones.

fields.caption: Hippo pools at dawn
fields.alt_text: Hippos clustered in a Mikumi river pool

fields.caption: Malundwe mountain ridge
fields.alt_text: Silhouette of Malundwe mountain against savanna

fields.name: Great Ruaha River View
fields.description: Riverine corridor and floodplain offering dramatic predator and elephant sightings along the Great Ruaha.
fields.short_description: River-based wildlife viewing in Ruaha NP.
fields.activities: Game drives, birding, river photography
fields.accessibility: Remote; best accessed by charter or long drive to park lodges.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Mostly vehicle-based; some lodge-led walks.

fields.caption: Elephants by the Great Ruaha
fields.alt_text: Herd of elephants drinking at the river edge

fields.caption: Lion pride near riverine thicket
fields.alt_text: Lions resting under riverine bushes in Ruaha

fields.name: Katavi Seasonal Plains
fields.description: Remote plains famous for massive seasonal concentrations of herbivores and intense predator activity.
fields.short_description: Wild, uncrowded seasonal wildlife spectacle in Katavi.
fields.activities: Game drives, remote wildlife photography
fields.accessibility: Remote access by charter flights or long road transfer; basic infrastructure.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Vehicle-based viewing; minimal walk access.

fields.caption: Seasonal herbivore congregation
fields.alt_text: Large herds of zebra and wildebeest on Katavi plains

fields.caption: Hippo pools and river channels
fields.alt_text: Hippos clustered in a Katavi wetland pool

fields.name: Rufiji River Boat Safari (Nyerere)
fields.description: Boat-based wildlife and birding safaris along the Rufiji River in Nyerere National Park (former Selous).
fields.short_description: River safaris on the Great Rufiji in Nyerere NP.
fields.activities: Boat safaris, walking safaris, fishing (licensed)
fields.accessibility: Charter flights or long drives to park entry points; boat ops available from lodges.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Boat-based; lodge-led walks available.

fields.caption: Boat safari on the Rufiji River
fields.alt_text: Small safari boat cruising a calm river with hippos visible

fields.caption: Hippos and riverbank birdlife
fields.alt_text: Hippos at the water's edge with fish-eating birds around

fields.name: Kitulo Flower Plateau
fields.description: High-elevation plateau celebrated for its spring wildflower displays and endemic orchids.
fields.short_description: Wildflower meadows and montane vistas on Kitulo Plateau.
fields.activities: Wildflower viewing, guided botanical walks, birdwatching
fields.accessibility: Road access from Mbeya with higher-elevation tracks; best with local guide.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short to moderate walks across plateau meadows.

fields.caption: Spring wildflower carpet
fields.alt_text: Masses of colorful wildflowers carpeting the Kitulo plateau

fields.caption: Endemic orchid close-up
fields.alt_text: Close-up of an endemic Kitulo orchid among grasses

fields.name: Rubondo Island Chimp Trail
fields.description: Forest trails for chimpanzee viewing, island wildlife walks and lakeshore scenery on Rubondo Island.
fields.short_description: Chimpanzee tracking and forest walks on Rubondo Island.
fields.activities: Chimp trekking, forest walks, boat trips, birding
fields.accessibility: Boat transfers from Lake Victoria ports; island lodges coordinate visits.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Island walking trails typically <3 km.

fields.caption: Chimpanzee in Rubondo forest
fields.alt_text: A chimpanzee perched on a branch in Rubondo Island forest

fields.caption: Rubondo lakeshore and forest edge
fields.alt_text: Forest meeting Lake Victoria shoreline on Rubondo Island

fields.name: Gombe Chimpanzee Trail
fields.description: Famous chimp tracking routes established by Jane Goodall; steep forest hikes to observe habituated chimp groups.
fields.short_description: World-famous chimpanzee tracking in Gombe Stream National Park.
fields.activities: Chimp trekking, forest hikes, lakeside views
fields.accessibility: Boat access from Kigoma; short but steep hikes to chimp sites.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Hiking required; trails up to several kilometers.

fields.caption: Chimpanzee mother and infant
fields.alt_text: Chimp mother carrying infant in Gombe rainforest

fields.caption: Lakeshore trail views
fields.alt_text: Forest path with view across Lake Tanganyika

fields.name: Mahale Chimp Trek
fields.description: Remote mountain and lakeshore chimpanzee trekking with spectacular Lake Tanganyika vistas.
fields.short_description: Mahale's famous chimpanzee tracking and lakeside scenery.
fields.activities: Chimp trekking, cultural visits, boat travel
fields.accessibility: Boat transfers from Kigoma; remote lodges coordinate excursions.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Trail hikes through forest; variable distances.

fields.caption: Mahale lakeshore and forest
fields.alt_text: Tropical forest sloping to clear Lake Tanganyika water

fields.caption: Mahale chimp group in forest
fields.alt_text: Group of chimpanzees in Mahale forest canopy

fields.name: Mkomazi Rhino Sanctuary
fields.description: Conservation areas focused on black rhino reintroduction and dryland wildlife in Mkomazi NP.
fields.short_description: Rhino and dryland species conservation zones in Mkomazi.
fields.activities: Guided conservation visits, game drives, educational tours
fields.accessibility: Accessible by road from Tanga and Moshi regions; conservation programs operate guided visits.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short guided walks in conservation zones.

fields.caption: Black rhino conservation area
fields.alt_text: Black rhino in dry scrub habitat in Mkomazi

fields.caption: Oryx and dryland species
fields.alt_text: Oryx standing on an open plain in Mkomazi

fields.name: Burigi Lake View
fields.description: Lake and wetland systems around Burigi-Chato offering birdlife and lakeside vistas.
fields.short_description: Lakeside birding and scenery in Burigi-Chato NP.
fields.activities: Birdwatching, boat trips, cultural visits
fields.accessibility: Road access from Bukoba; developing infrastructure for visitors.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short lakeshore walks.

fields.caption: Peaceful Burigi lakeshore
fields.alt_text: Calm lake waters with reeds and distant woodland

fields.caption: Waterbirds on lake
fields.alt_text: Variety of waterbirds along lake edge in Burigi-Chato

fields.name: Kigosi Wetland Walks
fields.description: Seasonal wetlands and floodplains supporting extensive waterbird populations and hippo habitats.
fields.short_description: Wetland birding and seasonal floodplain wildlife in Kigosi NP.
fields.activities: Birdwatching, boat trips in wetter months, guided walks
fields.accessibility: Remote access; seasonal roads may limit travel during rains.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short walks on raised paths; boat access in floods.

fields.caption: Seasonal floodplain and birds
fields.alt_text: Wetland floodplain filled with wading birds in Kigosi

fields.caption: Hippo in seasonal channel
fields.alt_text: Hippo partially submerged in a seasonal river channel

fields.name: Ibanda-Kyerwa Woodland Track
fields.description: Newly protected miombo woodlands and riverine strips with emerging trails and community tourism opportunities.
fields.short_description: Woodland and river trail experiences in Ibanda-Kyerwa NP.
fields.activities: Birdwatching, short walks, community visits
fields.accessibility: Developing access; best reached via Bukoba and regional tracks.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short to moderate walking distances on woodland tracks.

fields.caption: Miombo woodland track
fields.alt_text: Miombo woodland trail with tall trees and grassy understory

fields.caption: Woodland bird species
fields.alt_text: Small woodland bird perched on a branch in Ibanda-Kyerwa

fields.name: Rumanyika Cultural Viewpoint
fields.description: Hilly viewpoints and community sites with local history and scenic outlooks across Kagera woodlands.
fields.short_description: Scenic viewpoint and community tourism at Rumanyika-Karagwe NP.
fields.activities: Viewpoints, cultural tours, short walks
fields.accessibility: Road access from regional towns with limited infrastructure.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short walks to viewpoints and cultural sites.

fields.caption: Rolling hills and viewpoints
fields.alt_text: Hilly woodland landscape and lookout point in Rumanyika

fields.caption: Community tourism demonstration
fields.alt_text: Local cultural performers at a community tourism site

fields.name: Saanane Island Bird Trail
fields.description: Short island trails for birdwatching, primate sightings and lakeshore vistas close to Mwanza city.
fields.short_description: Accessible island birding and short walks on Saanane Island NP.
fields.activities: Birdwatching, short island hikes, educational visits
fields.accessibility: Boat access from Mwanza; ideal for half-day visits.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short island trails typically <3 km.

fields.caption: Island woodland and waterbirds
fields.alt_text: Small forest patch on island with waterbirds visible on lake

fields.caption: Saanane walking trail
fields.alt_text: Shaded walking track through dry forest on Saanane Island

fields.name: Sanje Waterfalls (Udzungwa)
fields.description: Scenic multi-tiered Sanje Waterfalls reached via rainforest hikes with opportunities to see endemic primates.
fields.short_description: Popular hike to Sanje Waterfalls in Udzungwa Mountains NP.
fields.activities: Hiking, swimming in designated pools, primate spotting
fields.accessibility: Road access to trailhead; forest hikes of moderate length required.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Hike of several kilometers (moderate difficulty).

fields.caption: Sanje Waterfalls rainforest trail
fields.alt_text: Water cascading down forested Sanje waterfalls

fields.caption: Endemic primate sighting
fields.alt_text: Udzungwa red colobus in forest canopy

fields.name: Saadani Beach & Mangrove Route
fields.description: Unique coastal area where savanna meets the Indian Ocean with beaches, mangroves and boat safaris for coastal wildlife.
fields.short_description: Coastal beach and mangrove experiences in Saadani NP.
fields.activities: Beach walks, boat safaris, mangrove birding, game drives
fields.accessibility: Road access from Bagamoyo and Tanga; boat transfers possible for some lodges.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Short beaches and mangrove trails.

fields.caption: Coastal beach meeting savanna
fields.alt_text: Sandy beach with nearby savanna grassland and mangroves

fields.caption: Mangrove estuary and boat safari
fields.alt_text: Mangrove-lined estuary with a small boat navigating

fields.name: Mafia Coral & Whale-Shark Zone
fields.description: Coral reef systems and seasonal whale shark encounters around Mafia Island — top diving and snorkeling destination.
fields.short_description: Diving, snorkeling and seasonal whale shark sightings at Mafia Island Marine Park.
fields.activities: Scuba diving, snorkeling, whale shark swimming (seasonal), reef conservation trips
fields.accessibility: Boat or small plane transfers to Mafia Island; dive operators available.
fields.walking_distance_from_road: Marine activities based from island lodges; short island walks available.

fields.caption: Coral reef lagoon at Mafia
fields.alt_text: Clear shallow coral lagoon with reef formations

fields.caption: Whale shark encounter (seasonal)
fields.alt_text: Whale shark feeding near the surface with snorkelers nearby
